tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_incident_logs (
    incident_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    employee_id INT,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50),
    description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    incident_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    incident_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    severity INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE breach_records (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    record_date TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    employee_id VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    breach_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    affected_records INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE BreachLogs (
  breach_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  breach_date DATE,
  breach_type VARCHAR(50),
  employee_id INT,
  breach_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE security_incidents (
  id INT NOT NULL,
  incident_date DATE,
  description TEXT,
  severity INT,
  status VARCHAR(20)
);

CREATE TABLE users (
  user_id INT NOT NULL,
  username VARCHAR(50),
  email VARCHAR(100),
  role VARCHAR(50),
  last_login DATETIME
);

CREATE TABLE incident_logs (
  log_id INT NOT NULL,
  incident_id INT,
  log_date DATETIME,
  log_description TEXT,
  user_id INT
);
